thread.title: Samsung CEO Han Jong and former UK Prime Minister Borris Johnson arrive in Mumbai for Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's wedding | Hindi Movie News - Times of India
thread.title_full: Samsung CEO Han Jong and former UK Prime Minister Borris Johnson arrive in Mumbai for Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's wedding | Hindi Movie News - Times of India

author: TOI Entertainment Desk
title: Samsung CEO Han Jong and former UK Prime Minister Borris Johnson arrive in Mumbai for Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's wedding | Hindi Movie News - Times of India
text: Celebrations are in full swing for the Ambanis and the Merchants as Anant Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant are all set to exchange vows in the sacred marriage on July 12 at the NMACC in Mumbai. Festivities are in order for both families. The VVIP guest list includes celebrities from all walks of life, and late on Thursday night, reality TV stars Kim and her sister Khloe Kardashian were spotted arriving for the celebrations at a private airport in Mumbai.Apart from them, Boris Johnson and Samsung CEO and tech wiz Han Jong Hee also landed in the city to attend the three-day festivities organised by both the families.At the Kalina airport, former UK PM Boris Johnson was spotted at the Kalina airport. He waved at the paparazzi before getting into her car and driving off. He was dressed in a printed shirt and trousers. Samsung CEO Han Jong Hee was also spotted at the do.On July 12, Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant will tie the knot after four months of star-studded pre-wedding events. Politicians, business titans, and celebrities from both India and beyond are among the guest lists.The wedding on Friday will take place at Jio World Convention Center in Mumbai, followed by dinner receptions on the following days. In addition to the Kardashians, insiders indicated that futurist Peter Diamandis, artist Jeff Koons, self-help coach Jay Shetty, former US Secretary of State John Kerry, former Canadian Prime Minister Stephen Harper, and former UK Prime Minister Tony Blair are likely to attend the lavish event. 111669752 111669252
